text:
@Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse But Trump says schools will be 'safe' ... 

At least 82 campers, counselors & staff at a summer camp in Missouri have been infected with COVID-19.

Kanakuk Kamps, Christian sports camps in MO, reopened their camps to thousands of kids beginning in May.
https://t.co/mWaO6w52Ar
